ElementInsertAdjacentHTML.summary:
The insertAdjacentHTML() method of the
interface parses the specified text as HTML or XML and inserts
the resulting nodes into the DOM tree at a specified position.

remarks.para:
-
-
-: Serialize a DOM tree into an XML string
-hacks.mozilla.org guest post by Henri Sivonen including benchmark showing
that insertAdjacentHTML can be way faster in some cases.
